<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Description: Replaces every &#96;ret&#96; instruction with the sequence:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// pop &lt;scratch-reg&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// lfence</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// jmp &#42;&lt;scratch-reg&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// where &#96;&lt;scratch-reg&gt;&#96; is some available scratch register, according to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// calling convention of the function being mitigated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
